titles.title: To extend the date after which interest earned on obligations held in the wildlife restoration fund may be available for apportionment.
To extend the date after which interest earned on obligations held in the wildlife restoration fund may be available for apportionment.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary: This bill amends the Pittman-Robertson Wildlife Restoration Act to delay by 10 years until 2026 the date after which interest from the wildlife conservation and restoration fund is available for apportionment.
